[米]
Pictogram ( 象形 ) – rice kernels without husk. The character 粟 , by contrast, refers to rice kernels with husk. According to Li Xiaoding (李孝定), the horizontal stroke is a bamboo sieve ( 籭 or 篩子 ). See also the bottom component of 暴 in its original form.
Unrelated to 木 , 禾 , and 来 .

[釆]
Pictogram ( 象形 ). According to Shuowen Jiezi, it's an animal paw with spread toes, hence the character is linked to 蹯 .
According to Zhang Shichao (張世超), it's the representation of a wooden plough ( 力 ) and some seeds to convey the concept of "disseminate, spread", hence the character is linked to 播 .
Unrelated to the top component of 𢍏 , used in 奧 .

[採]
Phono-semantic compound ( 形聲 / 形声 , OC *sʰɯːʔ ): semantic 扌 ( “ hand ” ) + phonetic 采 ( OC *sʰɯːʔ , “ to pick ” ) . Originally written 采 .
